title: Allow interaction between kinematic and dynamic objects

content.raw:
As discussed on the gazebo mailing list ( http://kforge.ros.org/pipermail/gazebo-list/2012-November/004337.html ) it would be nice to have kinematic objects be able to interact with dynamic objects. Right now physics needs to be turned off for the whole world while animating joints with disabled dynamics.

One example use-case would be to allow a robot arm to be controlled kinematically but still collide with and move dynamic objects in the scene.
Another use-case would be some moving obstacle that pushes dynamic objects away but doesn't get affected by dynamics.
